MibSpi_HwCfg_t Struct Reference
SPI Driver Internal Data Structures

SPI Driver HW configuration. More...

#include <drivers/spi/include/mibspi.h>

Data Fields

MIBSPIRegs * ptrSpiRegBase
 Base address of the MibSpi register address space to be used.

 Base address of the MibSpi ram address space to be used.
 
uint32_t clockSrcFreq
 SPI clock source frequency in Hz It will be used to calculate prescaler for Master mode.

 Interrupt Number for INT0.

 Interrupt Number for INT1.
 
MibSpi_DMAReqlineCfg dmaReqlineCfg [MIBSPI_SLAVE_MAX]
 SPI DMA reqline definition.
 

Detailed Description

SPI Driver HW configuration.

The structure is used to store the hardware specific configuration which is passed to SPI driver instance
